attributes.action: demand that the British government call for the immediate and unequivocal return of Shaker Aamer and Ahmed Belbacha to the United Kingdom from Guantánamo Bay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, demand that the British government call for the immediate and unequivocal return of Shaker Aamer and Ahmed Belbacha to the United Kingdom from Guantánamo Bay. Both men face no charges, have never been tried and are eligible for release. Both men have ties to the UK. Mr Aamer's wife and four children - the youngest of whom he has never seen - are British nationals. The UK must use its close relationship with the US and its commitment to the rule of law to help President Obama close down this illegal prison which he has termed “a misguided experiment”.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
